The recent 118-112 loss to the Brooklyn Nets made them equal with the poor record of the 2010-11 Cleveland Cavaliers and the 2013-4 Philadelphia 76ers. Now, the Pistons are in Boston trying very hard to stop their 28th straight loss. Americaâ€™s Favorite Video Today Fans react to â€œthe Troydan curseâ€ When the Pistons went up against the Boston Celtics, a surprising and debatable element came into the story â€“ YouTube star Troydan. From Canada, Troydan caught everyoneâ€™s attention when he wore a shirt during the game that said, â€œI flew from Canada to watch the Pistons lose their 28th gameâ€. The bad luck of the Pistons turned into a show. Fans were angry and called it â€œthe Troydan curseâ€.
